price: 18. Diggah sinni maaluk sadaqhat tacee labhaa kee sadaqhat tacee sayyó, usun Yallih fooca edde faxak meqe gacsa (amaaki) yeceenik, Yalli Keenih xirribisaah, wohuk bagul usun meqe galtó Ion (jannat kinnuk).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُصَّدِّقَٰتِ وَأَقۡرَضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muṣadiqīna wal-muṣadiqāti wa-aqraḍū al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan yuḍāʿafu lahum walahum ajrun karīmun
translations: and the women who give charity
